# checking for required packages, installing if necessary
reqPackages <- c("googlesheets", "magrittr", "dplyr", "httpuv")
newPackages <- reqPackages[!(reqPackages %in% installed.packages()[,"Package"])]
if(length(newPackages)) install.packages(newPackages)

# this script makes use of 3 packages

suppressMessages(library(dplyr))
suppressMessages(library(googlesheets))
suppressMessages(library(httpuv))
